## ApplicationVerifier interface

A verifier for domain verification and abuse prevention.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ApplicationVerifier 
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only implementation is [RecaptchaVerifier](./auth.recaptchaverifier.md#recaptchaverifier-class)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [type](./auth-types.applicationverifier.md#applicationverifiertype-property) | string | Identifies the type of application verifier (e.g. "recaptcha"). |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [verify()](./auth-types.applicationverifier.md#applicationverifierverify-method) | Executes the verification process. |

## ApplicationVerifier.type property

Identifies the type of application verifier (e.g. "recaptcha").

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly type: string;
```

## ApplicationVerifier.verify() method

Executes the verification process.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verify(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

A Promise for a token that can be used to assert the validity of a request.
